dependencies.description: A small library that versions your Python projects.

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description:
The typing_extensions module contains both backports of these changes as
well as experimental types that will eventually be added to the typing
module, such as Protocol (see PEP 544 for details about protocols and
static duck typing).
dependencies.name: py-typing-extensions

dependencies.description:
This package provides an implementation of "object interfaces" for
Python. Interfaces are a mechanism for labeling objects as conforming to
a given API or contract. So, this package can be considered as
implementation of the Design By Contract methodology support in Python.
dependencies.name: py-zope-interface

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description:
OpenSSH is the premier connectivity tool for remote login with the SSH
protocol. It encrypts all traffic to eliminate eavesdropping, connection
hijacking, and other attacks. In addition, OpenSSH provides a large
suite of secure tunneling capabilities, several authentication methods,
and sophisticated configuration options.
dependent_to.name: openssh

dependent_to.description: Pika is a RabbitMQ (AMQP 0-9-1) client library for Python.
dependent_to.name: py-pika

dependent_to.description: Prometheus instrumentation library for Python applications.
dependent_to.name: py-prometheus-client

description: An asynchronous networking framework written in Python
name: py-twisted

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
